languages.text: "Нет участи достойнее, чем принять дар избавления от мирских тревог и без устали трудом своим отдавать долг Империуму. Я полезен, а значит блаженен".
"There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."
languages.original_text: "Нет участи достойнее, чем принять дар избавления от мирских тревог и без устали трудом своим отдавать долг Империуму. Я полезен, а значит блаженен".

traits.locale_text: "There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."
"There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."

"There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."

languages.text: “人生最有价值的事情，莫过于接受救赎，摆脱世俗烦恼，不懈努力，为帝国尽忠职守。我是有用之人，因此我得到了祝福。”
languages.original_text: "There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."

traits.locale_text: “人生最有价值的事情，莫过于接受救赎，摆脱世俗烦恼，不懈努力，为帝国尽忠职守。我是有用之人，因此我得到了祝福。”

languages.text: 「世の苦しみからの解放を受け入れ、帝国の為に労働をするほど、素晴らしい事はないよ。私は使い道がある。だからこそ、私は報われている」
languages.original_text: "There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."

traits.locale_text: 「世の苦しみからの解放を受け入れ、帝国の為に労働をするほど、素晴らしい事はないよ。私は使い道がある。だからこそ、私は報われている」

languages.text: «No hay nada más digno en la vida que aceptar el don de la liberación de las preocupaciones mundanas y trabajar incansablemente para cumplir con el Imperium. Soy útil, por lo que se me ha bendecido».
languages.original_text: "There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."

traits.locale_text: «No hay nada más digno en la vida que aceptar el don de la liberación de las preocupaciones mundanas y trabajar incansablemente para cumplir con el Imperium. Soy útil, por lo que se me ha bendecido».

languages.text: "Es gibt kein würdigeres Los im Leben, als das Geschenk der Erlösung von weltlichen Sorgen zu empfangen und unermüdlich zu arbeiten, um seine Pflicht dem Imperium gegenüber zu erfüllen. Ich bin nützlich, also bin ich gesegnet."
languages.original_text: "There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt kein würdigeres Los im Leben, als das Geschenk der Erlösung von weltlichen Sorgen zu empfangen und unermüdlich zu arbeiten, um seine Pflicht dem Imperium gegenüber zu erfüllen. Ich bin nützlich, also bin ich gesegnet."

languages.text: « Il n'y a rien de plus glorieux que d'accepter le don d'être délivré des préoccupations matérielles et de travailler sans relâche à l'accomplissement de son devoir envers l'Imperium. Ma bénédiction est d'être utile. »
languages.original_text: "There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a rien de plus glorieux que d'accepter le don d'être délivré des préoccupations matérielles et de travailler sans relâche à l'accomplissement de son devoir envers l'Imperium. Ma bénédiction est d'être utile. »

languages.text: "Dünyevi endişelerden kurtarılma armağanını kabul etmek ve İmparator'un hizmetinde yorulmak nedir bilmeden çalışmak kadar şanlı bir yazgı olamaz. İşe yarıyorum, öyleyse kutsanmışım."
languages.original_text: "There is no worthier lot in life than to accept the gift of deliverance from worldly worries and labour tirelessly to render one's duty to the Imperium. I am of use, and therefore I am blessed."

traits.locale_text: "Dünyevi endişelerden kurtarılma armağanını kabul etmek ve İmparator'un hizmetinde yorulmak nedir bilmeden çalışmak kadar şanlı bir yazgı olamaz. İşe yarıyorum, öyleyse kutsanmışım."
